title: The One You Love by Paul Pilkington
description:
Publication Date: April 27, 2011
Emma Holden's nightmare has just begun. Her fiancÃƒÂ© vanishes, leaving the battered and bloodied body of his brother in their London apartment. Someone is stalking her, watching her every move. And her family are hiding a horrifying secret; a secret that threatens all those she loves. In a desperate race against time, Emma must uncover the truth if she ever wants to see her fiancÃƒÂ© alive again. 
The One You Love is a fast-paced suspense mystery, full of twists and turns, following in the tradition of writers such as Nicci French and Sophie Hannah.
Genre: Mystery & Suspense
